task: Develop a comprehensive marine resource surveillance system to ensure sustainable exploitation of marine life, optimize offshore aquaculture operations, predict and manage invasive species threats, enhance ecosystem resilience, and integrate renewable energy utilization for a low-carbon impact.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Main interaction interface with users, overseeing the marine resource surveillance system's operation.

agents.name: marine_life_exploitation_agent
agents.role: Ensures exploitation activities comply with sustainable quotas and monitors species distribution.

agents.name: legal_quota_management_agent
agents.role: Manages legal fishing quotas and monitors their compliance across fleet operations.

agents.name: species_distribution_tracking_agent
agents.role: Tracks the spatial and temporal distribution of marine species.

agents.name: exploitation_risk_evaluation_agent
agents.role: Evaluates risks associated with marine life exploitation based on distribution and quota data.

agents.name: offshore_aquaculture_optimization_agent
agents.role: Optimizes farming practices for offshore aquaculture to boost productivity and sustainability.

agents.name: aquaculture_performance_monitoring_agent
agents.role: Continuously monitors performance metrics of offshore aquaculture operations.

agents.name: feeding_system_adjustment_agent
agents.role: Adjusts feeding systems in response to performance data to optimize growth rates.

agents.name: biomass_yield_forecast_agent
agents.role: Forecasts future biomass yields based on current aquaculture performance.

agents.name: invasive_species_management_agent
agents.role: Predicts and manages threats from invasive species to native ecosystems.

agents.name: species_arrival_prediction_agent
agents.role: Predicts possible invasive species arrival based on environmental data.

agents.name: ecosystem_adaptation_agent
agents.role: Develops measures for ecosystems to adapt against invasive threats effectively.

agents.name: ecosystem_resilience_enhancement_agent
agents.role: Enhances ecosystems' resilience by examining restoration and interspecies relationships.

agents.name: restoration_efforts_evaluation_agent
agents.role: Evaluates the success of habitat restoration initiatives.

agents.name: habitat_connectivity_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes connectivity between different habitats to ensure ecological balance.

agents.name: species_interdependence_assessment_agent
agents.role: Assesses interdependence among species within ecosystems to identify critical species.

agents.name: renewable_energy_integration_agent
agents.role: Integrates renewable energy sources into marine operations to minimize carbon footprint.

agents.name: marine_energy_harnessing_agent
agents.role: Explores and evaluates marine energy sources for harnessing renewable energy.

agents.name: zero_carbon_footprint_tool
agents.role: Defines zero-carbon strategies for energy integration in marine ecosystems.

agents.name: energy_policy_optimization_agent
agents.role: Optimizes policies concerning renewable energy implementation in marine environments.

agents.name: surveillance_data_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes data from surveillance systems to provide insights into marine resources.

agents.name: remote_sensing_data_integration_agent
agents.role: Integrates remote sensing data for comprehensive marine resource analysis.

agents.name: machine_learning_insights_tool
agents.role: Utilizes machine learning to derive insights from complex data sets for trend identification.

agents.name: sustainability_trends_identification_agent
agents.role: Identifies sustainability trends based on comprehensive data analysis.

tools.name: genetic_adaptation_analysis_tool
tools.description: Analyzes genetic adaptations necessary for species survival against invasive threats.

species_genetic_data.description: Genetic data of species under threat.

invasive_species_characteristics.description: Characteristics of invasive species posing threats.

tools.name: zero_carbon_footprint_tool
tools.description: Develops strategies to achieve zero carbon footprint in marine energy utilization.

current_emissions.description: Current carbon emissions from marine operations.
